posts.name: Kate-signal
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.84 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Just in time for autumn, the new “Leafless Tree” emoji (along with the other six new emoji in Unicode 16.0) are now supported in emoji reactions.

In addition, with this release we’re continuing our TestFlight-exclusive testing of Backups. See the beta release post for 7.79 for more details.

Please continue to report any issues you encounter! We’ve added a new beta-only notification if your device runs into certain validation errors, so let us know if you see that.

When reporting issues, please include debug logs and screenshots if applicable; if you’re experiencing a crash, please also include .ips files. Instructions can be found here.

Thank you all, as always, for helping us improve Signal!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.79 release
Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.83 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.84.0.1127-beta

112 new commits since 7.83.0.1118-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.84 [1]

  • Add better handling of 429 in registration backup operations [2]

  • Add confirmation when user selects 'Skip Restore' [3]

  • Use spring animation for message info transition [4]

  • Remove throws from method that doesn’t throw [5]

  • Ensure all PluralAware strings use the right format method [6]

  • Reset local knowledge of media tier quota consumption when becoming free tier [7]

  • Modernize HTTPResponse [8]

  • Build fix in HTTPResponse [9]

  • Use RemoteConfig.messageQueueTime instead of hardcoding 45d in Backups strings [10]

  • Rename and flatten DonationSubscriptionConfiguration [11]

  • Add SubscriptionConfigMgr, use to populate Backups-related remote values [12]

  • Always use BackupSubConfig to drive free-tier media days in strings [13]

  • Pluralize Backups remote-populated strings [14]

  • Make DisplayableError more generically reusable [15]

  • UI Polls bug fixes [16]

  • Initial round of iOS 26 appearance updates to chat input bar. […] [17]

  • Use UISearchController in "Select Currency" screen. […] [18]

  • Adjust logging for unexpected upload errors [19]

  • Show error UX when media tier quota limit is consumed [20]

  • Clean up a noisy list media log [21]

  • Avoid Any?-typed responseBodyJson for all but one caller [22]

  • Remove 'Backup Failed' ChatListFYISheet [23]

  • Badge the chat list settings button when out of media tier quota [24]

  • Migrate PreKeys to a dedicated table [25]

  • Don't owsFailDebug when parsing the primary device [26]

  • Fixed a couple issues around failed backup badge rendering [27]

  • Fetch remote config after registration [28]

  • Present a notification when we discover you have consumed your media tier quota [29]

  • Remove GroupsV2Error.redundantChange [30]

  • Remove GroupsV2Error.shouldDiscard [31]

  • Add mutual exclusion when sending to a recipient [32]

  • Fix broken icon badging call [33]

  • Use KeyedConcurrentTaskQueue for group updates [34]

  • Fix broken animation of "pin confirmation" screen dismissal. [35]

  • UI polish for the calls tab. […] [36]

  • Add some horizontal padding around "N Selected" in chat view on iOS 26. [37]

  • Unify backdropColor values. […] [38]

  • Add some support for binary service IDs [39]

  • Fix format args for mutual groups [40]

  • Updates to Chat, Calls and Stories views. […] [41]

  • Update Your Account Data screen. […] [42]

  • Use LargePrimaryButtonStyle for big blue button on Linked Devices screen. […] [43]

  • Clean up use of linking text view. […] [44]

  • Quote reply icons for polls [45]

  • Local user ended the poll info messages don't show on synced iPad [46]

  • Change denominator to be total voters, not total votes [47]

  • More Polls UI polish [48]

  • Delay pending vote UI [49]

  • Downgrade BackupPlan -> .free when the remote subscription expires [50]

  • Make "Reset Chat Colors" and "Reset Chat Wallpaper" red. [51]

  • Icon not showing up for group in poll vote [52]

  • Add more support for binary service IDs [53]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.85.1 [54]

  • Rename FeatureFlags → BuildFlags [55]

  • Use native sheets for emoji picker [56]

  • Nicer layout for disappearing messages interval picker. [57]

  • Fix section footer text too small in OWSTableVC2 subclasses. […] [58]

  • Very unnecessary changes to OWSTableViewController2. [59]

  • Second round of improvements to chat input bar appearance on iOS 26. […] [60]

  • fix build. [61]

  • Fix chat input bar not usable when tall. […] [62]

  • Remove duplicate title from Export Account Data screen. [63]

  • Use monospace font for "N Selected" in conversation screen's bottom bar. [64]

  • Change fallback for hasIPhoneXNotch [65]

  • iOS 26 context menu and emoji bar updates [66]

  • Modernize "Group Link Promotion" screen. [67]

  • Fix wrong color for chat list section header background on iPad. [68]

  • Use modern looking buttons in backup flow on iOS 26. [69]

  • Fixes for incorrect UI state in chat screen bottom panel. […] [70]

  • Updates to end poll [71]

  • Update context menu background handling [72]

  • Update sheet corner radii [73]

  • signal symbols font changes [74]

  • Fix incorrect animations in chat list. […] [75]

  • Fix short mentions picker causing chat input bar to stretch vertically. [76]

  • Allow using Recovery Key instead of PIN [77]

  • Don't retry HTTP 508 errors in message sends [78]

  • Modernizations to Subscription [79]

  • Fix AssertOnMainThread for out-of-storage-quota notification [80]

  • Allow resetting Backups onboarding from Internal Settings without disabling [81]

  • Add Terms & Privacy Policy link to backups subscription screen [82]

  • Forgot to move the T&C into the footer [83]

  • Fix unreadable "large primary" swiftui buttons in "disabled" state. [84]

  • Reuse code for generating signed pre key ids [85]

  • Add Promise when sending group update messages [86]

  • Adopt new markKyberPreKeyUsed API [87]

  • Move per-recipient error handling to the job queue [88]

  • Improve HTTP 429 handling in AccountChecker [89]

  • Add group update parameter when deleting account [90]

  • Fix iOS 26 message select toolbar [91]

  • Use glass for reaction list sheet [92]

  • Leave groups before deleting account [93]

  • Add poll remote configs [94]

  • Add UX for Backups subscription renewal failures [95]

  • Remove assertion that’s not always true [96]

  • Update the access control for a few methods [97]

  • Cancel join requests when deleting account [98]

  • Remove dead code for computing group revisions [99]

  • Exclude inviteLinkPassword when canceling request [100]

  • Ensure local identifier checks match [101]

  • bump proto version for polls [102]

  • Polls RTL polish [103]

  • Update string for Backups purchase-redemption error [104]

  • Remove TSGroupThread membership wrappers [105]

  • Don’t use codegen when fetching unique IDs [106]

  • Remove anyExists [107]

  • Update translations [108]

  • Revert "Relax Xcode version checks in GitHub Actions" [109]

  • Revert "Use Xcode 26.0.1" [110]

  • Revert "Fix Xcode 26 builds on CI" [111]

  • Revert "Switch to Xcode 26.0" [112]

posts.name: Robert Grey
posts.cooked:
I really hope this is an oversight and a work in progress because if not, it’s way too cluttered and just does not look good at all - alignment, redundant, etc

IMG_94151173×249 27.6 KB

posts.name: tadhglewis
posts.cooked:
Definitely an oversight haha. The camera and mic is duplicated. Although even if you remove the two right icons, I’m not sure how I feel about putting these buttons inside the text box - other messengers don’t

Screenshot 2025-10-30 at 10.14.48 am1320×306 21.9 KB

posts.name: tadhglewis
posts.cooked:
Fyi I still have corrupted call links from Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.80 release - #15 by tadhglewis

Would restoring from backup fix this? Or is it still being worked on?

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.80 release

posts.name: Robert Grey
posts.cooked: Yea, I think everything should be behind the “ + “ on the left, similar to how iMessage does it. Perhaps the only one that should be visible beside the text box is either the mic or cam icon

I think the “+” menu needs to be revamped to just include the row of icons at the bottom. Now that Signal has embraced the superior native photo picker, the app-specific one should be removed and so should the prompt to enable it.

posts.name: Chloe
posts.cooked:
IMG_41101284×1505 182 KB

I know we complained about the chatbox, but the chatbox also shouldn’t fly off screen with a link embed preview.

Expanding the emoji reaction list moved the lower bar up and down

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.84.0/19c1c4c988ed040c29a38463fdf2dbe4ca711baf274063534a6cb31bca314851.zip

The backup plan comparison view got even worse

I really don’t like the rendundant information, but now the text is misaligned. Also why does the premium backup tier now include more than >100GB of storage?

image1170×2532 251 KB

Like previously reported doubled icons problem and transparent background. I think it’s another iOS 26 issue.

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.84.0/2096f3834cfe29de89774838bd1faee15ecb5ba8f5708206cab1f73fe1938b76.zip

IMG_31221179×275 18.1 KB

IMG_31231179×370 27.6 KB

posts.name: Jacek K
posts.cooked:
If you have wallpaper set, the message box looks like this

image1179×305 48.5 KB

posts.name: Delamcode
posts.cooked:
image1125×2436 146 KB
Even worse on a mini iphone lol

posts.name: link ✦
posts.cooked:
everyone, i understand that this beta version has multiple issues with the layout and performance, and i experience them myself, too. however, please remain respectful towards the developers.

the issues are indeed likely caused by iOS 26 compatibility that has been previously stated to have caused many issues with the Signal UI components. they’re not intentional changes and i imagine they’ll be fixed soon.

thanks for your understanding and continued beta participation!

p.s. please remember to add debug logs when experiencing issues to help resolve them!

like this: https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.84.0/b24d584c1427e6f084c9ef57e9999f53b34379528d196a2c21d06a64aa1fe706.zip

posts.name: Delamcode
posts.cooked:
Yeah ofc, just reporting bugs

image1125×683 28.4 KB
This is weird as well btw
This is the whole reason to beta test, find and report bugs and issues! Okay and a bit to sneak peak at what’s to come. Looking forward to see what Signal for 26 looks like.
